meanings.definition: A group of genetic disorders that affect the white matter of the brain and spinal cord.
meanings.sent1: Leukodystrophy can cause problems with how the brain works.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying leukodystrophy to find better treatments.
meanings.sent3: When the brain's white matter misbehaves, that's leukodystrophy!
meanings.sent4: Her brain's white matter turned into a tangled mess, like a leukodystrophy of thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The image of leukodystrophy in the brain is like a storm cloud blocking the sun.

meanings.definition: A condition characterized by the abnormal growth of white matter in the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: The abnormal growth of white matter in leukodystrophy can disrupt signals in the body.
meanings.sent2: Leukodystrophy can lead to problems with movement and coordination.
meanings.sent3: When the white matter parties too much, it's leukodystrophy!
meanings.sent4: Her nervous system's white matter grew uncontrollably, a leukodystrophy of wires.
meanings.sent5: The abnormal white matter growth in leukodystrophy is like vines taking over a garden.
